widget_file_size <- function(p) {
  d <- tempdir()
  withr::with_dir(d, htmlwidgets::saveWidget(p, "map.html"))
  f <- file.path(d, "map.html")
  mb <- round(file.info(f)$size / 1e6, 3)
  message("File is: ", mb," MB")
}
widget_file_size(p)
